text.section: The Commission and the exclusive representative shall execute a collective bargaining agreement incorporating all matters agreed.

A collective bargaining agreement may include a provision for:
dues and maintenance or service fees paid by payroll deduction; and
the arbitration of grievances arising under the collective bargaining agreement.
The collective bargaining agreement supersedes any conflicting rule, regulation, or administrative policy of the Commission.
